title: Epilepsy Treatment Protocol
content: Epilepsy management aims to achieve seizure freedom without significant medication side effects. Antiepileptic drug selection is based on seizure type, epilepsy syndrome, comorbidities, and patient characteristics. Monotherapy is preferred initially, with polytherapy considered for refractory cases. Medication adherence is crucial for seizure control. Surgical evaluation is recommended after failure of two appropriate antiepileptic medications.
